author: Practical Engineering
description:
Some of the hidden details behind this very cool piece of infrastructure.
🥑 Claim your 10 Free Meals + Free Breakfast for Life by using code PRACTICALFM at https://bit.ly/41PhMMi! One free meal per box with active subscription. Free meals applied as discount on first box, new or returning subscribers only, varies by plan.

📢Check out Radiolab's new release about the survivors of Pompeii here: ⁨@R@Radiolabpod 

The Falkirk Wheel didn’t just reconnect two canals. It reconnected people with the idea that infrastructure can be both useful and pretty cool.

Watch this video ad-free on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/practical-engineering-whats-the-deal-with-the-falkirk-wheel

Signed copies of my book (plus other cool stuff) are available here: https://store.practical.engineering/

Practical Engineering is a YouTube channel about infrastructure and the human-made world around us. It is hosted, written, and produced by Grady Hillhouse. We have new videos posted regularly, so please subscrib
title: What’s the Deal with the Falkirk Wheel?
